Please choose ONE location. Bethel Community Church , 600 E Tabor Ave, Fairfield , 1st & 3rd Friday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Dover Elementary , 301 E Alaska Ave, Fairfield , 1st & 3rd Friday 4:00-5:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Golden Hills Education Center , 2460 Clay Bank Rd, Fairfield , 2nd & 4th Wednesday 2:00-3:00pm. Salvation Army Fairfield , 1216 Missouri St, Fairfield , 2nd & 4th Thursday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. True Love Baptist Church , 1956 Pennsylvania Ave, Fairfield , 2nd & 4th Wednesday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. WIC Fairfield , 2101 Courage Dr, Fairfield , 2nd & 4th Thursday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Mobile Pantry Distribution Families and individuals can pick up FREE fresh produce, proteins, dairy and a variety of nonperishable food once or twice a month. Please choose ONE location. Fairfield Seventh-day Adventist Church , 1101 E Tabor Ave, Fairfield , 3rd Friday 10:00am-12:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Our Lady of Mount Carmel , 2700 Dover Ave, Fairfield , 2nd and 4th Wednesday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Meet in the rear parking area of Our Lady of Mount Carmel Church. Please bring your own bags Partner Food Pantry Pantries provide FREE food to the public. Please note: Each pantry has its own guidelines. Check with them about specific eligibility requirements and pick-up limits. Bethel Community Church of Fairfield (Drive-Thru), 600 E Tabor Ave, Fairfield , 1st & 3rd Wednesday 9:00-10:30am. Phone: 707-427-1415 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Fairfield City Church , 743 E Tabor Ave, Fairfield , Monday-Friday 1:00-4:00pm
Saturday 11:00am-4:00pm
Sunday 1:00-4:00pm. Phone: 707-426-2172 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Fairfield Seventh-day Adventist Community Services , 1101 E Tabor Ave, Fairfield , 2nd & 4th Wednesday 10:30-11:30am. Phone: 707-426-6720 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Fairfield-Suisun Adult School , 900 Travis Blvd, Fairfield , Thursday 11:30am-1:00pm. (This site is closed during summer, spring, and winter breaks. Please call for more information.) . Phone: 707-421-4155 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Fairfield-Suisun Community (CANB) , 416 Union Ave, Fairfield , Monday, Wednesday & Friday 12:00-2:00pm. Phone: 707-427-1148 119 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Liberty Church , 2641 N Texas St, Fairfield , Saturday 9:00-10:00am. Phone: 707-425-9673 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. LOGIC Ministries , 533 Jackson St, Fairfield , Monday-Friday 11:00am-1:00pm.
							Please head inside the complex and turn right. At the second stop sign turn left. Please bring two bags with handles. Phone: 707-310-1259 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Mount Calvary Baptist Church (Drive-Thru), 1735 Enterprise Dr Bldg 3, Fairfield , Thursday 1:00-3:00pm. Phone: 707-425-1849 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Mount Carmel (SVdP) , 2700 Dover Ave, Fairfield , .
							By appointment only. For Fairfield, Suisun City, and Cordelia residents only. Please Bring ID. Phone: 707-422-5209 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Parkway Plaza , 188 E Alaska Ave, Fairfield , 1st Tuesday 10:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 925-676-7543 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Rockville Presbyterian Fellowship (at Salvation Army) , 1200 Missouri St, Fairfield , Monday & Wednesday 1:00-2:00pm. Phone: 707-439-7980 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Salvation Army Fairfield , 1200 Missouri St, Fairfield , Monday 9:00am-12:00pm
Wednesday 9:00am-12:00pm.
							Proof of address is required. Bring ID for proof. Food available for pick up once a month. Phone: 707-439-7980 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Samoan Christian Fellowship (Drive-Thru), 1200 Western St, Fairfield , Wednesday 11:00am-1:00pm. Phone: 707-428-4221 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. St. Mark’s Lutheran Church , 1600 Union Ave, Fairfield , Tuesday 2:00-5:00pm. Phone: 707-422-4741 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. St. Stephens CME Church Feed My Sheep , 2301 Union Ave, Fairfield , 2nd & 4th Wednesday 2:00-4:00pm. The Edge Community Church , 1039 Washington St, Fairfield , Wednesday 12:00-2:00pm.
							If you prefer email, schedule an appointment with passiontothestreets@gmail.com Phone: 707-421-9430 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. True Love Baptist Church , 1956 Pennsylvania Ave, Fairfield , 2nd & 4th Wednesday 10:00am-1:00pm. Phone: 707-426-2776 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Senior Food Program FREE groceries twice a month to individuals aged 55 or older who meet income guidelines. Only one senior per household can receive food. Bring a picture ID and proof of address (PG&E bill, for example). St. Mark's Lutheran Church , 1600 Union Ave, Fairfield , 1st & 3rd Wednesday 9:00-10:00am.
